response.overview: The Lab LA is Mixmag and WAV's weekly live stream and post-work unwind, powered by Void Acoustics, where we showcase the finest DJs direct from our downtown Los Angeles office. On Tuesday, join us for a Lab LA session early on in the week with Chrome Sparks.  Chrome Sparks is Jeremy Malvin, who joins us in The Lab LA to celebrate the release of his self-titled, debut album out on Counter Records. He's come a long way since his breakout tune on Future Classic, 'Marijuana', and his synthy, sparkling sound has pushed him ahead of the pack and seen him play across North America, Australia, New Zealand and Asia. He's currently on his ongoing North American tour with Machinedrum. Find more info and tickets here: http://www.chromesparks.com
response.title: Chrome Sparks - The Lab LA
